item.description:
快一些 🩴：

🎉 单独打开模式下支持打开单文件，同时速度快了不少
🍭 编辑模式下支持左上角3个按钮自适应显示、最小高宽度支持分屏使用
🙊 修复文章超过一屏，回车易抖动问题、继续优化启动效果、减少易Crash的点

Hurry up 🩴：

🎉 Single file can be opened in separate open mode, and the speed is much faster.
🍭 Editing mode supports split screen use, the adaptive display of three buttons at the upper left corner.
🙊 Fix the problem that the article is more than one screen, and it is easy to shake when entering, continue to optimize the startup effect, and reduce the points prone to crash.

内在美🍒：

🎉 你会发现编辑器的文字更舒服一些了，细调了下文字间距
🍭 支持文章内容的搜索替换，快捷键 command+shift+f 和 command+shift+r
🩴 修复了几个容易 Crash 的点，顺便减少了下包体积到 23M

Inner Beauty🍒：

🎉 You will find that text of editor is more comfortable, optimize text spacing.
🍭 Support search and replacement within the note, shortcut keys are command+shift+f and command+shift+r.
🩴 Fixed several points that are easy to crash, and reduced the size to 23M.

好用一些 🎉：

🐶 较 V1.1.0，修复了 PPT 导出时闪动、预览效果优化、支持 TodoList 使用
🎉 支持更简洁的妙言，你可以在设置中设置 Hover 才显示按钮
🍭 支持嵌入各类有趣的东西，codepen、codeSandbox、youtube 等等
🩴 妙言 PPT 结合真实使用场景优化了很多，同时支持导出 PPT 的 PDF
🙊 解决预览时标题可能会闪一下、解决复杂 LaTeX 输入，可用 span 标签包裹、优化输入 Emoji 的体验
😂 TouchBar 菜单栏没啥用干掉了，整体框架视觉继续优化，标题处有间距调整

Easy to use 🎉：

🐶 Compared with V1.1.0, Fixes the flicker of PPT export, Optimization of preview experience, Supports the use of todolist.
🎉 Support more simple about MiaoYan. You can use Hover button in the setting.
🍭 Support embedding all kinds of interesting things, codepen/codeSandbox/youtube etc.
🩴 Miaoyan ppt optimizes a lot in combination with real use scenarios, and supports PDF export of PPT.
🙊 Solved problem that the title may flash during preview, and solve the complex LaTeX input problem, you can use span surround.
😂 The TouchBar is useless, the spacing is adjusted at the title.

好用一些 🎉：

🎉 支持更简洁的妙言，你可以在设置中设置 Hover 才显示按钮
🍭 支持嵌入各类有趣的东西，codepen、codeSandbox、youtube 等等
🩴 妙言 PPT 结合真实使用场景优化了很多，同时支持导出 PPT 的 PDF
🙊 解决预览时标题可能会闪一下、解决复杂 LaTeX 输入，可用 span 标签包裹、优化输入 Emoji 的体验
😂 TouchBar 菜单栏没啥用干掉了，整体框架视觉继续优化，标题处有间距调整

Easy to use 🎉：

🎉 Support more simple about MiaoYan. You can use Hover button in the setting.
🍭 Support embedding all kinds of interesting things, codepen/codeSandbox/youtube etc.
🩴 Miaoyan ppt optimizes a lot in combination with real use scenarios, and supports PDF export of PPT.
🙊 Solved problem that the title may flash during preview, and solve the complex LaTeX input problem, you can use span surround.
😂 The TouchBar is useless, the spacing is adjusted at the title.

终于来了 ❤️：

🍭 妙言支持快速写PPT啦，详细可见Github
🎉 支持编辑预览滚动到对应为止、支持设置代码字体、支持设置预览宽度
🩴 修复 PicGo 图片上传兼容性问题、预览样式优化、编辑体验优化、支持行内代码

Finally Coming ❤️：

🍭 MiaoYan support writing ppt quickly, which can be seen in Github.
🎉 It supports editing preview scrolling to the corresponding position, setting code font, and setting preview width.
🩴 Fix PicGo image upload compatibility problems, preview style optimization, editing experience optimization, and support in-line code.

漂亮升级：

😶‍🌫️ 在 0.9.0 版本基础上修复了一个可能会影响大家使用的 Bug
🍭 补全编辑器大量语法颜色高亮，你会发现编辑器更加潮流了
🎉 支持快捷键输出粗体/斜体/删除线/下划线/链接，支持块 tab 左右移动
🩴 支持 Emoji shortName、不同字体的最适应行高、导出文档支持添加标题、支持设置锚点滚动、支持外链打开
🙊 快捷键规范化，显示字数修改成 command+option+i，打开 Finder 统一成 command+option+r，新建文件夹统一成 command+shift+n
😂 修复反复格式化偶现 crash 问题、修复黑暗下虚线展示、修复超链接高亮偶尔错误问题

Beautiful Upgrade：

😶‍🌫️ A bug that may affect your use has been fixed on the basis of version 0.9.0.
🍭 Complement editor a large number of syntax color highlights. You will find that the editor is more fashionable.
🎉 Support shortcut key output bold/italic/strike/underline/link, Support block tab to move left and right.
🩴 Support Emoji shortname, The most suitable line height of different fonts, Export document auto add title, Set anchor scrolling, Can copy external url.
🙊 Shortcut keys are normalized, Number of displayed words is changed to command+option+i, Finder is opened and unified as command+option+r, New folder is unified as command+shift+n.
😂 Fix the occasional crash of repeated formatting, Fixed the dotted line display in the dark, and the occasional error of hyperlink highlighting.

建议升级：

🎉 支持文档间跳转，试试 [[对应文档标题]] 点击即可无缝跳转到对应文档
🏂 支持单独编辑器模式，试试 command+o 打开文件，或者文件拖到图标
🍭 command+shift+ → 可显示字数等属性，上下左右箭头可以控制文档导航，支持 command+option+m 全局唤起妙言
🙊 优化导出的样式、焦点选择、高亮、搜索框样式、ESC 失焦、升级，支持 Picsee 图床

Update Notes：

🎉 Jump between documents is supported. Try [[document title]] Click to seamlessly jump to the corresponding document.
🏂 Support separate editor mode. Try command+o to open the file, or drag the file to the icon.
🍭 command+shift + → attributes such as number of words can be displayed, and the up, down, left and right arrows can control document navigation, Support command+option+m global evoke wonderful words.
🙊 Optimize the exported style, focus selection, highlighting, search box style, ESC out of focus, upgrading, and support picsee upload.

更新记录：

  1. 🎉 终于支持 uPic、PicGo 图床了，可设置中打开，支持复制图片和截图上传
  2. 🍭 完成 LaTeX 性能优化，不需要设置默认开启
  3. 🏓 支持从预览界面 command+c 直接复制选中富文本
  4. 🙈 持续优化编辑器体验，如新建、删除、行高、焦点、搜索、笔记数

Update Notes：

  1. 🎉 Finally, uPic and PicGo upload are supported, You can set them to open and try, Support copying pictures and uploading screenshots.
  2. 🍭 To complete latex performance optimization, You do not need to set the default on.
  3. 🏓 Support to copy the selected rich text directly from the preview interface with command+c.
  4. 🙈 Continuously optimize the editor experience, such as new creation, deletion, row height, focus, search, and number of notes.

更新记录：

  1. 🎉 终于支持了 PlantUML、Mermaid、LaTeX 的渲染，LaTeX 需设置打开
  2. 🍭 支持预览富文本复制，排序功能继续优化，重排、删除后更新、焦点逻辑变聪明了
  3. 🙈 修复文章新建极小概率 Crash，感谢 sbccznfy 帮忙复现
  4. 🛠 Command + H 窗口隐藏，阅读效果持续优化，菜单布局优化

Update Notes：

  1. 🎉 Finally, Supports the rendering of PlantUML, Mermaid and PlantUML、Mermaid、LaTeX, LaTeX needs to be set to open.
  2. 🍭 Support preview rich text copy, the sorting function continues to be optimized. Rearrangement, update after deletion, and focus logic become smarter.
  3. 🙈 Repair the article and create a new minimum probability crash. Thank sbccznfy for helping to reproduce it.
  4. 🛠 The command + H window is hidden, the reading effect is continuously optimized, menu layout optimization.

更新记录：

  1. 🎉 侧边栏支持手势收起展开，可以在标题栏位置双指滑动试试
  2. 🍭 细调了一下深色模式，更舒服了，你切换一下试试不错
  3. 🏓 优化编辑器的体验，更好支持表格展示、行高、选中、搜索的能力
  4. 🛠 修复侧边栏偶现横向滚动、初始化标题焦点、深色下表格预览问题

Update Notes：

  1. 🎉 The sidebar supports the gesture of folding and expanding, Try sliding with both fingers in the title bar.
  2. 🍭 Fine tune the dark mode, which makes it more comfortable, It's good to switch it.
  3. 🏓 Optimize the editor experience, better support the ability of table display, row height, selection and search.
  4. 🛠 Fixed occasional horizontal scrolling in the sidebar, Initialize Title Focus, and table preview in dark color.

更新记录：

  1. 🙊 这次真的支持 ARM64 打包了，右键显示简介为「通用架构」🎉
  2. 🍭 文档支持导出成PDF和图片了📑，在文档列表右键看看
  3. 🐱 双击左上角标题栏，可以放大到窗口最大和缩小到原来
  4. 🩴 重新优化了一下文档排序的功能，增加升序降序选项

Update Notes：

  1. 🎉 This time, ARM64 packaging is really supported,Right click to display the introduction as 「common architecture」 🎉 .
  2. 🍭Documents can be exported to PDF and Image 📑, Right click on the document list.
  3. 🐱 Double click the title bar in the upper left corner to zoom in to the maximum size of the window and zoom out to the original size.
  4. 🩴 Re optimized the document sorting function and added the ascending and descending options.

更新记录：

  1. 🎉 支持 ARM64 打包，不过我不是M1电脑，辛苦你帮忙试试
  2. 🍭 预览界面改成赫蹏样式增强，新增几个我喜欢的字体，可去设置看看
  3. 🐱 第一次使用时候优化默认宽度，默认文件夹，中文下 App 名称改成妙言
  4. 🩴 将妙言的域名修改成 miaoyan.app

Update Notes：

  1. 🎉 ARM64 packaging is supported, but I am not an M1 computer. Please try it with your help.
  2. 🍭 Preview style has been changed into heti, and add some new fonts I liked.
  3. 🐱 Optimize the default width and folder when using it for the first time, and change the app name in Chinese to 妙言.
  4. 🩴 Change the domain name of miaoyan to miaoyan.app.

更新记录：

  1. 🎉 支持演示模式，去试试 command + 4
  2. 🎉 支持文档自动排版，去试试 command + shift + l
  3. 🐱 给汤圆可乐增加了一个喂罐头的 页面
  4. 😂 支持预览模式下，全选右键复制富文本到其他地方
  5. 🛠 修复设置中选中当前项也重置、完成对 Mojave 系统的兼容

Update Notes：

  1. 🎉 Support presentation mode, go try command + 4
  2. 🎉 Support document auto typesetting, go try command + shift + l
  3. 🐱 Added a page for feeding cans to TangYuan and Cola.
  4. 😂 Support preview mode, full right click copy rich text to other places.
  5. 🛠 Fixed reset of selected current item in settings, completed compatibility with Mojave system.

更新记录：

  1. 🎉 终于支持设置字体和字号啦🙊🙊🙊🙊
  2. 🍭 优化黑暗模式的展示，比之前更黑一些了
  3. 🍭 代码支持pre标签、增加淡化背景、视觉展示优化
  4. 🏂 支持复制的图片可以粘贴、默认宽度优化、编辑和预览切换优化
  5. 🛠 修复预览模式下标题还可以编辑的问题

Update Notes：

  1. 🎉 Support setting font and font size. 🙊🙊🙊🙊
  2. 🍭 Optimize the presentation of dark mode,Darker than before.
  3. 🍭 The code supports pre tags, adds fade background, and optimizes visual presentation.
  4. 🏂 The copied pictures can be pasted, default width optimization, editing and preview switching optimization.
  5. 🛠 Fix the problem that the title can be edited in preview mode.

更新记录：

  1. 🛠 修复预览页面默认字体不是霞鹜文楷的 Bug
  2. 🛠 修复窗口隐藏以后不会再出现在调度中心的 Bug

Update Notes：

  1. 🛠 Fix bug that the default font of preview is not LXGW WenKai
  2. 🛠 Fix bug that will not appear in the mission control after the window is hidden

更新记录：

  1. 🛠 修复全屏高度的问题
  2. 🎉 官网终于好了 https://miaoyan.vercel.app

Update Notes：

  1. 🛠 Fix full screen height bug.
  2. 🎉 The official website is ready. https://miaoyan.vercel.app

1. 🎉 支持英语，可去设置中更改 / Support English, you can go to the settings to change.
  2. 🍭 视觉优化，如文档日期显示时间、小 icon 优化、显示等 / Visual beautification, such as document date display time, small icon beautification, display, etc.
  3. 😂 新增帮助菜单，可以关注我以及给妙言反馈问题 / New help menu, you can follow me and give feedback to MiaoYan

1. 全新视觉和编辑预览体验升级，兼容 macOS Monterey 版本
  2. 序号分号等支持自动递增，效果不错
  3. 默认的字体更新成霞鹜文楷
  4. 修复标题更新有时候不保存的 bug
  5. 回车标题自动 focus 到内容区域
  6. 支持本地图片的展示和引入
  7. 支持自动更新 App
